ygData.subject: Got my armor!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... This definitely is bad. Although it was good 10 minutes ago when the stupid knight finally spawned after a 6 hour wait and I got my arms, bp and helm and
ygData.messageBody:
> I came across some disturbing info last night...
> Darkforge Armor is no longer NO DROP.
> All the pieces that I have that WERE NO DROP, arent
> any longer.

This definitely is bad. Although it was good 10 minutes ago when the stupid
knight finally spawned after a 6 hour wait and I got my arms, bp and helm
and then the SK i was waiting with gave me a fire emerald plat ring and
500pp for the vambraces. :)

In general though I think this is bad. Especially cause the exp reward is
pretty good. Those three pieces took me from being a sliver from 31 to a
full bub into 31.

Must sleep now. Tired from sitting on my butt for 6 hours waiting for my
quest giver to spawn.<<sigh>>
